caption: Spyre chip, card and system diagrams.
Chip ﬂoorplan annotated with voltage domains, ring bus, core and IP blocks. Design metrics from frequency scaling experiments: power and cell area vs.
(a) Peak power speciﬁcation across different systems; (b) Dual loop control for peak current management.

(a) Measured normalized performance (1/ITL) as a function of Spyre instance count; (b) Inference with 1, 2, and 4 Spyres, identical time scales, showing TTFT and ITL improvements.
